name: model-splitter
description: Splits a model into multiple models with different LOD levels and downscales textures. For use with Wonderland Engine

scripts.clean: shx rm -rf lib/* pkgs/* model-splitter-gui-linux.tar.gz model-splitter-gui-win.zip nwjs-pkg-linux nwjs-pkg-win nwjs-out/*-bundle.js nwjs-out/*-bundle.js.map nwjs-out/library.wasm nwjs-out/draco_decoder_gltf.wasm nwjs-out/mikktspace_main_bg.wasm nwjs-out/Build example-project/cache example-project/deploy example-project/static/basis-transcoder-worker.js example-project/static/basis-transcoder-worker.js.map lib-static/basis-transcoder-worker.js lib-static/basis-transcoder-worker.js.map
scripts.copy-nwjs-third-party-blobs: pnpm run copy-nwjs-draco-blobs && pnpm run copy-nwjs-mikktspace-blobs && pnpm run copy-nwjs-gltfpack-blobs
scripts.copy-third-party-blobs: pnpm run copy-draco-blobs && pnpm run copy-mikktspace-blobs && pnpm run copy-gltfpack-blobs && npm run copy-nwjs-third-party-blobs
scripts.build-runtime-lib: tsc -p ./tsconfig-browser.json --noEmit && tsc -p ./tsconfig-worker.json --noEmit && esbuild --minify --bundle --sourcemap --target=es6 --platform=browser --format=esm --outfile=lib/runtime-lib.esm.js src/browser/runtime-lib.ts && esbuild --bundle --target=es6 --platform=browser --minify --sourcemap --format=iife --external:fs --external:path --outfile=lib-static/basis-transcoder-worker.js src/worker/basis_loader.ts
scripts.build-cli: tsc -p ./tsconfig-base.json --noEmit && esbuild --minify --bundle --sourcemap --target=es6 --platform=node --format=iife --banner:js='#!/usr/bin/env node' --outfile=lib/cli.js src/base/cli.ts && shx chmod +x ./lib/cli.js
scripts.build-gui: tsc -p ./tsconfig-base.json --noEmit && tsc -p ./tsconfig-browser.json --noEmit && tsc -p ./tsconfig-worker.json --noEmit && esbuild --minify --bundle --target=es6 --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=nwjs-out/worker-bundle.js src/worker/gui-worker.ts && esbuild --minify --bundle --target=es6 --platform=node --format=iife --outfile=nwjs-out/renderer-bundle.js src/browser/gui-renderer.ts
scripts.pkg-gui: pnpm run pkg-gui-linux && pnpm run pkg-gui-win
scripts.build-all: pnpm run build-runtime-lib && pnpm run build-lib && pnpm run build-cli && pnpm run build-gui && pnpm run gen-types
scripts.pkg-all: pnpm run pkg-cli && pnpm run pkg-gui
scripts.build-pkg-all: pnpm run clean && pnpm run copy-third-party-blobs && pnpm run build-all && pnpm run pkg-all
scripts.dev-gui: pnpm run copy-nwjs-third-party-blobs && concurrently 'esbuild --watch --minify --bundle --sourcemap --target=es6 --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=nwjs-out/worker-bundle.js src/worker/gui-worker.ts' 'esbuild --watch --minify --bundle --sourcemap --target=es6 --platform=node --format=iife --outfile=nwjs-out/renderer-bundle.js src/browser/gui-renderer.ts' 'cd nwjs-out; nw-sdk .'
